description: List Deere equipment with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Admins can list all Deere equipment. Non-admin users can only list Deere equipment scoped to brokers they are members of (policy scope filters by broker membership).
validation_notes: Date-time filters (equipment-assigned-at-min, equipment-set-at-min/max, created-at-min/max, updated-at-min/max) must be non-empty, parseable date-time values (ISO 8601). Boolean filters (has-equipment, is-equipment-set-at, is-created-at, is-updated-at) require strict true/false values; other values are rejected.

flags.name: --has-equipment
flags.validation: Must be true or false (strict boolean).

flags.name: --equipment-assigned-at-min
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty ISO 8601 date-time.

flags.name: --equipment-set-at-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum equipment set timestamp (ISO 8601)
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty ISO 8601 date-time.

flags.name: --equipment-set-at-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum equipment set timestamp (ISO 8601)
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty ISO 8601 date-time.

flags.name: --is-equipment-set-at
flags.description: Filter by has equipment set timestamp (true/false)
flags.validation: Must be true or false (strict boolean).

flags.name: --created-at-min
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty ISO 8601 date-time.

flags.name: --created-at-max
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty ISO 8601 date-time.

flags.name: --is-created-at
flags.validation: Must be true or false (strict boolean).

flags.name: --updated-at-min
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty ISO 8601 date-time.

flags.name: --updated-at-max
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty ISO 8601 date-time.

flags.name: --is-updated-at
flags.validation: Must be true or false (strict boolean).
